sqlMap.select: select a.JGBM as jgbm,a.WS_DM as wsDm,a.YXBZ as yxbz,a.CJR_CZY_DJXH as cjrCzyDjxh, a.CJRQ as cjrq,a.XGR_CZY_DJXH as xgrCzyDjxh,a.XGRQ as xgrq,a.WSSPMS_DM as wsspmsDm from QY_SPWS a where a.JGBM=#jgbm# and trim(a.WS_DM)=#wsDm#
sqlMap.update: update QY_SPWS set JGBM=#jgbm#,WS_DM=#wsDm#,YXBZ=#yxbz#,CJR_CZY_DJXH=#cjrCzyDjxh#, CJRQ=to_date(#cjrq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),XGR_CZY_DJXH=#xgrCzyDjxh#,XGRQ=to_date(#xgrq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), WSSPMS_DM=#wsspmsDm# where JGBM=#jgbm# and WS_DM=#wsDm#
sqlMap.delete: update QY_SPWS set yxbz='N' where JGBM=#jgbm# and WS_DM=#wsDm#
